divs: Sighting DetailsMufon dispatch took the sighting over the phone, Steve Cox, Mufon Dispatch Looked like a circle with a ring around it 6 of them, lights were yellowish white, making a octigon patern. prity low twist back and forth, glow very bright dim twist to the left and got bright again. 2 airplanes 1 from the south and 1 from the north were approaching them, objects left rapidly, witness was north west of the sighting.witness states it was about a mile away from witness and a about 200 feet above tree line,
trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Arvada
